replies.msg:
係時候又要想當年黎鼓勵下大家

是咁的

兩年前我就take左SOSC1350，咁呢個course就凈計attendance、midterm同final既者，而midterm同final就全MC，open notes。

咁我midterm都做得唔太好，錯左兩題，無左3.X%course grade。 所以我唯有attendance take足再加final爆seek。

而到左考final個日，我一起身就特別精神，考試亦做得特別快。兩個鐘既考試，我一個鐘都唔使就做晒40題MC，再加上我之後有試，咁我大概45分鐘就舉手交卷 。個TA都嚇親，過黎收卷之餘仲等埋我一齊行出試場。沿路見到一班人R晒頭，仲奮鬥緊，見我提早交卷早走個種眼神，我睇得出愕然同埋羨慕。

唔知大家有無試過提早交卷肯定自己一定滿分，呢種智商上既優越感

真係好爽

咁出到去試場，個TA就問我:做好晒啦?咁早走

但我無正面回答佢，我只係問佢: 呢個Course攞幾多percent先有A-range

TA: 未知架，要等professor定，你好有信心wo

我: 哦，無啊，問下者，今個sem多謝晒，拜拜

而我最後final 滿分 攞A+

人生試一次呢種經歷真係

而到左考final個日，我一起身就特別精神，考試亦做得特別快，cheatsheet用都冇用過。三個鐘既考試，我一個鐘都唔使就做晒40題MC+7題LQ，再加上我之後要同女食飯，咁我望多幾望就舉手交卷 。個Prof都嚇親，過黎收卷之餘仲等埋我一齊行出試場。沿路見到一班人R晒頭，仲奮鬥緊，見我提早交卷早走個種眼神，我睇得出愕然同埋羨慕。

唔知大家有無試過提早交卷肯定自己一定滿分，呢種智商上既優越感

真係好爽

咁出到去試場，個Prof就問我:做好晒啦?咁早走

但我無正面回答佢，我只係問佢: 呢個Course攞幾多percent先有A range

Prof: 未知架，要睇全部section嘅performance先決定，你好有信心wo

我: 哦，無啊，問下姐，今個sem多謝晒，拜拜

而我最後final 滿分 攞A+

人生試一次呢種經歷真係

好佩服你 我都係精神病人 要長期食fluoxetine 20mg
上兩年因為 dysthymia令到我情緒極度極度低落 ，但我亦都唔可以懶哂心理問題，各種因素都有關
好開心，呢半年病情好好多，cga亦有進步
雖然醫生同我講我長期都要靠食藥保持比較開心ge狀態，但好開心好開心I have emerged , bit by bit .
望番轉頭，原來我已經遠離左之前個我好耐，但係唔係有dysthymia 我唔會有咁轉變
when u get past the fear, u can see depression for what it really is. It s an issue not an identity. When u get past the ridicule and judgement and the stigma of others, u know that s just a part of life. Some of the parts of depression dragged me down to , in a lot of the ways I m grateful for it,it put me down to valleys just to show me there is peak
仲有年半grad , 希望把握最後時間衝刺
忠告：發覺情緒有問題應該盡早睇醫生搵方法幫自己，純9up

replies.msg:
以下是根據龜殼字刻節錄的東九龍線計劃所考慮的方案：

列車方案
＝＝＝＝
方案A：3卡傳統輪軌（類似南港島線）
方案B：5卡直線電機（類似廣州地鐵4、5及6號線）
方案C：6卡APM膠輪（類似香港機場旅客系統）
** 視乎採用不同的列車種類，將影響各車站的深度及出入口的數量 **

走線方案
＝＝＝＝
方案1：鑽石山、彩雲、順天、秀茂坪、康盛(Optional)、寶琳、科技大學(Optional)
方案2：鑽石山、彩雲、順天、秀茂坪、寶琳、科技大學(Optional)
方案3：鑽石山、彩雲、順天、秀茂坪、寶琳北、科技大學(Optional)
** 走線方案1及2可提供更佳的鐵路網絡，而走線方案3則可吸納新增客源 **

車站設計
＝＝＝＝
1) 鑽石山站
位置：彩虹道（大有街及四美街之間）的地底
出口：彩虹道
　　　綜合發展區行人隧道

2) 彩雲站
位置：彩雲（二）邨停車場的地底
出口：以升降機連接彩雲（二）邨停車場

3) 順天站
位置：利安道、順安道及安茵街之間的山中地底
出口：順安邨（升降機出口）
　　　順天邨（升降機出口）
　　　聯合醫院

4) 秀茂坪站
位置：秀茂坪道、寶琳路及安秀道之間的山中地底
出口：秀茂坪道（升降機出口）
　　　秀豐街近秀茂坪商場（升降機出口）
　　　秀麗街近曉麗苑
　　　寶琳路近寶達商場（升降機出口）
　　　秀茂坪南邨（升降機出口）
　　　安泰邨 (Optional)
　　　安達臣道石礦場發展區 (Optional)

5) 康盛站 (Optional)
位置：寶琳北路及寶琳南路交界附近地底
出口：(待定)

6) 寶琳站
位置：寶豐路（貿業路及欣景路之間）
出口：與將軍澳線寶琳站共用

7) 寶琳北站（不經康盛站及寶琳站的走線方案）
位置：寶琳北路近寶林消防局
出口：寶琳北路及寶康路交界
　　　寶琳北路近寶德樓

8) 科技大學站 (Optional)
位置：清水灣道及科大黃焯書科研中心之間
出口：清水灣道（升降機出口）
　　　香港科技大學近學術大樓

其他資料
＝＝＝＝
車廠：位於寶琳北路將軍澳第8區
側線：壞車側線位於鑽石山站以西、秀茂坪站附近、科技大學站（如興建）以北
長度：鑽石山站至寶琳站約7.3公里
車程：鑽石山站至寶琳站約10分鐘
班次：繁忙時間約3分鐘一班
轉乘：鑽石山站設收費區通道連接沙中線
　　　寶琳站（適用於走線方案1及2）設收費區通道連接將軍澳線

由於很多細節仍未定案，上述資料僅供參考。

－－－

資料來源：九龍灣站路邊垃圾桶、龜殼字刻

University Withdrawal & Re-admission

You may ask to withdraw from a degree program by making a written application to ARR, Academic Registry.

The University may require you to withdraw if you fail to register in a regular term without having obtained permission to take leave from study, or for another reason.

In all such cases, your registration at the University will be terminated.

If you withdraw or are required to withdraw from the University, you must complete clearance procedures as specified by the Academic Registrar. The related form can be downloaded here.

You may subsequently apply for re-admission to the University by following the usual admission procedures.

If you withdraw from the University and subsequently are re-admitted, course grades and credits that you obtained within five years prior to re-admission may be used to fulfill the requirements for your program, unless you have used these grades and credits to earn another academic qualification, either at HKUST or elsewhere.

Grade Review

Students who consider that a mistake has been made in the process of calculating or determining a grade for a course may apply for a review of the grade. They should first discuss the matter with the course instructor as soon as the course grades are released. Where a clerical or administrative error has been made, the department/unit responsible for the course will report the revised grade to ARR, Academic Registry.

If the student’s concern remains unresolved after this informal discussion, the student may submit a request for a grade review to the Head of the course-offering department/unit in writing within two weeks from the day on which grades are released:

i. Stating the grounds for the request for review
ii. Describing the relevant facts
iii. Providing supporting evidence

If a review is granted, the Head will arrange for the review within three weeks after the release of the grade.

Requests for review of course grades should normally be resolved at the department/unit level. Students who wish to appeal against the decision of the department/unit must do so in writing to the Dean of the School within two weeks of receiving the decision stating the grounds for the appeal.

Upon receipt of the written appeal, the Dean will determine whether or not a further review of the grade should be granted and how the review will be conducted. The Dean’s decision is final.

Grade review deadlines for the academic year of 2017-18 are as follows:

Academic Term Deadline

Fall 2017-18 12 January 2018

Upon receipt of the written appeal, the Dean will determine whether or not a further review of the grade should be granted and how the review will be conducted. The Dean’s decision is final.

Students who consider that a mistake has been made in the process of calculating or determining a grade for a course may apply for a review of the grade. They should first discuss the matter with the course instructor as soon as the course grades are released. Where a clerical or administrative error has been made, the department/unit responsible for the course will report the revised grade to ARR, Academic Registry.

If the student’s concern remains unresolved after this informal discussion, the student may submit a request for a grade review to the Head of the course-offering department/unit in writing within two weeks from the day on which grades are released:

i. Stating the grounds for the request for review
ii. Describing the relevant facts
iii. Providing supporting evidence
